name: Painter Weave Library
summary: A WEAVELIBRARY file stores a collection of weaves created by Corel Painter, a drawing application used to create digital artwork. It contains various media weaves, which are textured patterns Painter users can add to the canvas. Examples of weaves users may find in WEAVELIBRARY files include Pastel Plaid, Checkerboard Diamonds, and Picnic weaves.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
